actionConfiguration.body:
update retailer set 
	license_days = {{license.text}},
	status = {{status_dd.selectedOptionValue}},
	stop_date = {{stop_date.text}},
	status_bucket = {{bucket.selectedOptionValue}},
	updated_agent_id = {{agent_up.selectedOptionValue}},
	remark= CONCAT('{{prev_remarks.text}}'::text,'  ',CURRENT_DATE,'-','{{agent_up.selectedOptionLabel}}'::text,'-Status:','{{status_dd.selectedOptionValue}}'::text,'-Days:','{{license.text}}'::text,'-Remarks:','{{retailer_remark.text}}'::text),
	updated_time = now(),
	retailer_gstin = {{gstin_no.text}},
	retailer_pan = {{pan_no.text}},
	retailer_email = {{retailer_email.text}},
retailer_gst_applicable = {{gst_applicable.selectedOptionValue}}
	
	where retailer_code={{retailer_code_select.selectedOptionValue}};
